Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State , #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 29 State , 36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State , #36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Cermak due to a stalled train.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Cermak due to a stalled train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to a stalled train near Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to a stalled train near Cermak.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound service is not affected.
